result.eng: Tell him to wait for me.
result.ga: Abair leis fanacht liom
result.orig: Abair leis fanacht liom
result.html: Abair leis fanacht liomTell him to wait for me.
result.ponchtml: Abair leis fanaċt liomTell him to wait for me.

result.eng: It would better to stay out of view.
result.ga: B'fhearr fanacht as amharc
result.orig: B'fhearr fanacht as amharc
result.html: B'fhearr fanacht as amharcIt would better to stay out of view.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr fanaċt as aṁarcIt would better to stay out of view.

result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ga: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.orig: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.html: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamhI'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom fanaċt taoḃ istiġ den ḟoirgneaṁI'd rather stay inside the building.

result.eng: I'll be staying in a caravan.
result.ga: Beidh mé ag fanacht i gcarbhán
result.orig: Beidh mé ag fanacht i gcarbhán
result.html: Beidh mé ag fanacht i gcarbhánI'll be staying in a caravan.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag fanaċt i gcarḃánI'll be staying in a caravan.

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ga: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.orig: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.html: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn fanaċt go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.

result.eng: I was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha CliathI was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag fanaċt le mo ḋearṫáir agus mé i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫI was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: He was waiting at the house door.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.orig: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.html: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag fanaċt ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.

result.eng: You must stay at home then.
result.ga: Caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.orig: Caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.html: Caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ tú fanaċt sa ḃaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.

result.eng: Where are you staying?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil tú ag fanacht
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tú ag fanacht
result.html: Cá bhfuil tú ag fanachtWhere are you staying?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tú ag fanaċtWhere are you staying?

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.

result.orig: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin

result.eng: I can't stay awake.

result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom fanaċt i mo ḋúiseaċtI can't stay awake.

result.eng: I can't wait any longer.
